issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 2, "transformer", in androidx.viewpager.widget.ViewPager.setPageTransformer) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
